alert.note: Alert for Hunterdon (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:09PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hunterdon and north central Bucks Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 308 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Erwinna, or 17 miles southeast of Easton, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Byram, Tinicum, Clinton, Frenchtown, Milford, Bloomsbury, Stockton, Ottsville, Sergeantsville, Pipersville, Erwinna, Lumberville and Sand Brook. This includes Interstate 78 in New Jersey between mile markers 7 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
